Review: This movie was the turning point of Thalapathy Vijay's career. Vikraman's great dialogues and screenplay made this movie as superhit. One of a great acting shown by Thalapathy vijay. His calmness & expressions were highlight in the movie. Nambiar & Nagesh sir played a wonderful role. Songs are the major highlights of the movie especially "Aanandham aanandham" song. Poove Unakkaga Thalapathy Vijay's careers change movie. If you are a Vijay fan or Interested in Vijay's movies then this is the must watch movie for you all!

Review Title: One of the family films that catapulted Vijay to stardom.
Review: At a time when Vijay needed a hit, at a time when he needed a way to be recognized by women and children, for him to reach households, Vikraman came along and cast him in this family entertainer. Overnight, Poore Unakkaga catapulted Vijay into being the face of a new age lover: a man who instead of drinking and bemoaning his spurned love, decides to help the girl of his heart build a life that she wants.This family entertainer with stellar performances from Sangeeta, MN Nambiar, Nagesh and others is sure to tug on your heartstrings. The music is also compelling. "Anandham" and "Sollamale" are beautiful numbers. Watch for the entertainment and the soulful music and to see how the roots of Vijay's present stardom began.
